VBDM module¶

Vector Borne Disease Model Class.

Contains class for specific diseases that inherit from the class VectorBorneDiseaseModel. Also contains methods to read in root configuration file.

class VBDM.VectorBorneDiseaseModel(config_file, disease_name)¶

Bases: object

Defines a general vector borne disease model.

Reads root config file and sets parameters.

Attributes:

params: ODE system parameters. initial_states: initial states for population sizes.

abstract model_func(y, t, p)¶
run_model()¶

Runs ODE solver to generate model output

save_output(disease_name)¶

Save output to file

abstract set_y0()¶
